description: Learn how to cook salmon to perfection with this simple seafood recipe. Try it today for the best crispy-skin salmon you'll ever have.
keywords: Fish dishes,Pescatarian,Low salt,Low sugar,Valentine's Day,Potato,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Wheat free,Salmon
name: Crispy-Skin Salmon With Crushed Potatoes & Chimichurri Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 long red chillies, deseeded, finely chopped
800g Simply Steam herb & butter baby potatoes

recipeInstructions.text: Pat fish dry with paper towels. Season skin with salt and set aside.
Combine parsley, chilli, garlic, vinegar and 1/2 cup oil in a bowl. Season.
Cook potatoes according to packet instructions. Using the back of a fork, lightly crush potatoes.

Meanwhile, pat salmon skin dry with paper towels. Heat remaining oil in a large non-stick frying pan over medium-high heat. Cook fish, skin-side down, for 5 minutes or until crisp and brown. Turn and cook for a further 1 minute for medium rare or until cooked to your liking.
Serve salmon with potatoes and chimichurri.
